alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 14 at 7:53PM CDT until March 17 at 1:51AM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Mount Carmel, Vincennes, Riverton, and Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southwestern Indiana. Flooding is expected to continue on the Wabash into Thursday. River levels are falling. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday /8:00 PM EDT Tuesday/ the stage was 18.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday /8:00 PM EDT Tuesday/ was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 6.6 feet Friday, March 24. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
